about_the_game:
Build Oil Rig in the Drill Deal simulator!

Start your adventure by building your own oil rig! Start with a small platform and expand it to a large interconnected complex of platforms!
Optimize your designs for more efficient production, increase cash flow and keep your employees happy and safe!

Remember your company's reputation!

Sign long-term contracts to sell your products. Acquire new customers interested in your resources. Manage your reputation and customer relationships and at the same time - INCREASE YOUR PROFITS!

You will find many unique events and scenarios

You will be able to manage your platform during an environmental crisis. You will face many challenges and threats such as: snow blows, storms, fires and many more! Remember that it is your responsibility to protect your employees from attacks by greedy pirates, terrorists and from deadly diseases!

Manage your Oil Rig crew

Remember about the careful and accurate selection of your employees. Pay attention to their various skills and statistics. Take care of their satisfaction and quality of life on the platform. Build your gameplay and provide them with better accommodation as your platform grows. Qualified and satisfied workforce is the key to increasing the efficiency of your production!


Experience different scenarios in different places of the world. Ranging from freezing arctic with snow and blizzards, through tropical waters with pirates, to haunted islands.
Enter the world of Drill Deal!
